subject: Mixed Martial Arts
lead_paragraph: The mixed martial artist Johny Hendricks spent months in the gym to prepare for his welterweight championship fight at U.F.C. 171 against Robbie Lawler.
snippet: The mixed martial artist Johny Hendricks spent months in the gym to prepare for his welterweight championship fight at U.F.C. 171 against Robbie Lawler.
